Standard Life Private Equity Trust PLC

LEI: 2138004MK7VPTZ99EV13

6 January 2022

Quarterly Disclosure

In accordance with UKLA Listing Rule 15.6.8, Standard Life Private Equity Trust PLC announces that as at 31 December 2021 it had no investments in other UK listed investment companies (including investment trusts) which themselves do not have a stated investment policy to invest no more than 15% of their gross assets in other UK listed investment companies (including investment trusts).

Kerry Higgins

Aberdeen Asset Management PLC

Secretaries

Enquiries: 0207 618 1578
